flawed_nl_solution:
Rachel has 1500 - 135 - 141 envelopes = <<1500-135-141=1224>>1224 envelopes remaining to stuff.
Rachel has 8 hours - 2 hours = <<8-2=9>>9 hours left to finish the task.
Rachel needs to stuff 1224 envelopes / 9 hours = <<1224/9=136>>136 envelopes per hour.
#### 136

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 6, not 9. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
